vsParam: Huh? Why did you sigh, Ryza?
Huh? I feel that I've gotten used to life in the Academy.
And nothing exciting has happened lately...
Yeah. Ah, I'm not saying that the Academy is boring.

I just feel that it's a bit old-fashioned...
And there's nothing special.

Special... As a guard, I'll say that
nothing special is a good thing.
Alright. Don't say that. Let's think of something for Ryza!
OK... Something special, special... Got it!

How about renovating the Academy?
We have all gotten tired of the same view, right?

Renovating... Why don't we call it refitting?
Yeah. Let's refit this Academy?

No! Absolutely not! You can't refit something
just because you're tired of it!
... Peppermint, this might be a great idea.

Huh? What's happening here, Anise?
Refitting is against the Academy rules...
What if we only "change the appearance"?

Brilliant! If we only change the appearance which can be
restored, it will help boost our spirits!

Changing the appearance of the Academy.
I'm already excited just thinking about it!
Yeah! Cresson... It would be nice if the Academy rules allow it...

Alright... I don't think the Academy rules
forbid changes in appearance.

Of course. Under the condition that all changes are reversible!
In such a way, I think the Academy rules allow refitting.
Wow. Thanks, Cresson!! Yeah. I feel that we'll have a great time!

Right! So, let's split up to collect materials to change
the appearance of the Academy.

I'll be in charge of cloth; Anise and Ryza should take care
of decorations and Cresson will be responsible for furniture!

Furniture! Hey, to what extent do you want to refit
the Academy? Can you really restore everything...
Of course! Ah. [px] and Peppermint, please find some parts!
Alright~ Copy that! Let's go find kawaii parts, [px]!

Yeah. The Academy is to take on a new look!
So exciting!
